name: Lethal Labyrinths
description:
Welcome to the Lethal Labyrinths! You are going to embark on a journey to complete 3 perilous mazes, and will be loaded with 4 weapons to use including one purchasable weapon on each maze. You have been locked in these mazes by an alien species who invaded and wiped out the Earth. The only survivors of the invasion have been taken by these mazes. You are the only survivor. Escape these mazes and you will be free forever! Farewell, and good luck, Survivor.

These mazes include health bottles, claymores, ammo boxes and more! Fight off the mutants in the mazes to escape and be free forever.

Everything in this game is created by me. Email me at bankshotzombies1@gmail.com
